name: Star Miner
description:
Mine for riches on a randomly generated collapsing star, where the ground rapidly disintegrates around you. Use mined resources to upgrade your bots to better survive the searing hot atmosphere and reach the core of the dying star to claim the heart.

Entry for Ludum Dare 49 - Unstable

This game has an ending and will take roughly 5-10 minutes to complete.

Everything was made from scratch over 3 days except:

Music: CO.AG Music - Zombie
